Dating: MIDDLE KINGDOM (not before); 11TH DYNASTY; MIDDLE KINGDOM (not after)
Name: Stele of Samontuweser
Description: A round-topped stele showing the deceased sitting on a stool, a long staff topped by a mace-head in his left hand. A female dog sits under the stool. In front of him is a pile of offerings including vases, loaves of bread, the forelegs of oxen, a fowl, vegetables etc. Above the scene are 7 horizontal lines of hieroglyphs.
